dmca.title: Notification of copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: David Layne [mailto:davidllayne@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, June 03, 2006 10:00 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notification of copyright Infringement
Subject: Notification of copyright Infringement


Dear Sirs,
 
   I , Daivd L Layne, am the copyright owner of the Screenplay Suicide
Blonde which has been posted on one of "ThePlanet.com"'s servers. The
url of the directory is  http://www.maithily.com/screenplays
<http://www.maithily.com/screenplays>  .  I wish to have the file
suicideBlonde-darkComedy1_1_pdf.zip removed from your servers.  To be
precise,
http://www.maithily.com/screenplays/suicideBlonde-darkComedy1_1_pdf.zip 
 
The source material was copyrighted by me as "The Gravediggers" with the
Library of Congress and registered with The Writers Guild of America.
 
Apparently, most of the screenplays in that directory were posted
without permission after being downloaded from a creative workshop site
www.triggerstreet.com .  While I'm a rank amateur, some of those
screenplays are from award winning writers. 
 
I hereby attest  that the information in this notification is accurate,
and under penalty of perjury, that I, the Complaining Party, have the
exclusive right to the material contained in the file
http://www.maithily.com/screenplays/suicideBlonde-darkComedy1_1_pdf.zip
.
 
 
Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to this matter,
 
Sincerely,
 
David L. Layne
davidllayne@gmail.com
